properties.areaDesc: Middlesex; Lower Bucks; Mercer; Western Chester; Somerset
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:48PM EST until January 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches.

* WHERE...In New Jersey, Somerset, Middlesex and Mercer. In
Pennsylvania, Western Chester and Lower Bucks.

* WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 1 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop west to east
from Saturday morning into the afternoon. The heaviest snow
will likely occur from mid to late afternoon. Snow will likely
change to rain through the early evening with some sleet
possible during the transition.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 1 AM EST SUNDAY
